channel.title: How to change max exp?
channel.description:
In my server, i have level 109 as the max level.. this makes the combat lvl 138 (like rs) But when you go above a certain amount of exp the level goes back down to 99.. i was wondering if you could make the max exp a certain number so you cant go above it and make it reset to 99...
Is this possible and does anyone know how to do it...?
Thanks.

item.title: How to change max exp?
item.dc:creator: @RarerThanRares RarerThanRares
item.description:
@RarerThanRares wrote:

i dont acctually remember saying that max exp is 200m…

I need to set it to a max of 35534655

im not sure how to though…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2009, 05:44:58 pm[/size][hr]Does anybody know? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2009, 09:53:20 am[/size][hr]Fixed it, For anybody that wants to know, open client.java and search for

playerXP[skill] >

the number after that is the max exp amount, change that number to whatever you need

Read full topic

item.title: How to change max exp?
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

Well, I believe the experience value is an integer and an integers parameters are from -2147M to 2147M. But, I don’t really know actually what the value of the integer parameter is.

Read full topic
